verses.verse: And Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30>, the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>, took <WH3947> either <WH376> of them his censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> in it <WH2004>, and put <WH7760> incense <WH7004> on it <WH7126>, and offered strange <WH2114> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, which he commanded them not <WH6680>.
And there went out <WH3318> fire <WH784> from the Lord <WH3068>, and devoured <WH398> them <WH4191>, and they died before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>.

Then Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, This is it that the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696>, saying <WH559>, I will be sanctified <WH6942> in them that come near <WH7138> me <WH6440>, and before all the people <WH5971> I will be glorified <WH3513>. And Aaron <WH175> held his peace <WH1826>.

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> Mishael <WH4332> and Elzaphan <WH469>, the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel <WH5816> the uncle <WH1730> of Aaron <WH175>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH7126>, Come near, carry <WH5375> your brothers <WH251> from before <WH6440> the sanctuary <WH6944> out <WH2351> of the camp <WH4264>.
So they went near <WH7126>, and carried <WH5375> them in their coats <WH3801> out <WH2351> of the camp <WH4264>; as Moses <WH4872> had said <WH1696>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, and unto Eleazar <WH499> and unto Ithamar <WH385>, his sons <WH1121>, Uncover <WH6544> not your heads <WH7218>, neither tear <WH6533> your clothes <WH899>; lest you die <WH4191>, and lest wrath <WH7107> come upon all the people <WH5712>: but let your brothers <WH251>, the whole house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, bewail <WH1058> the burning <WH8316> which the Lord <WH3068> has kindled <WH8313>.

And you shall not go out <WH3318> from the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, lest you die <WH4191>: for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> of the Lord <WH3068> is upon you <WH6213>. And they did according to the word <WH1697> of Moses <WH4872>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,

Do not drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH7941>, you <WH1121>, nor your sons with you <WH935>, when you go into the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, lest you die <WH4191>: it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755>:
And that you may put difference <WH914> between holy <WH6944> and unholy <WH2455>, and between unclean <WH2931> and clean <WH2889>;
And that you may teach <WH3384> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> all the statutes <WH2706> which the Lord <WH3068> has spoken <WH1696> unto them by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.

And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, and unto Eleazar <WH499> and unto Ithamar <WH385>, his sons <WH1121> that were left <WH3498>, Take <WH3947> the food offering <WH4503> that remains <WH3498> of the offerings <WH801> of the Lord <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>, and eat <WH398> it without yeast <WH4682> beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196>: for it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>:

And you shall eat <WH398> it in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>, because it is your due <WH2706>, and your sons <WH1121>' due <WH2706>, of the sacrifices <WH801> of the Lord <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>: for so I am commanded <WH6680>.

And the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785> shall you eat <WH398> in a clean <WH2889> place <WH4725>; you <WH1121>, and your sons, and your daughters <WH1323> with you for they be your due <WH2706>, and your sons <WH1121>' due <WH2706>, which are given <WH5414> out of the sacrifices <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

The heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785> and the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> shall they bring <WH935> with the offerings made by fire <WH801> of the fat <WH2459>, to wave <WH5130> it for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>; and it shall be your <WH1121>, and your sons' with you <WH2706>, by a statute for ever <WH5769>; as the Lord <WH3068> has commanded <WH6680>.

And Moses <WH4872> diligently <WH1875> sought <WH1875> the goat <WH8163> of the sin offering <WH2403>, and <WH8313>, behold, it was burnt: and he was angry <WH7107> with Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar <WH385>, the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> which were left <WH3498> alive <WH559>, saying,

Why have you not eaten <WH398> the sin offering <WH2403> in the holy <WH6944> place <WH4725>, seeing it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>, and God has given <WH5414> it you to carry <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the congregation <WH5712>, to make atonement <WH3722> for them before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>?

Behold <WH2005>, the blood <WH1818> of it was not brought <WH935> in inside <WH6441> the holy <WH6944> place <WH398>: you should indeed have eaten <WH398> it in the holy <WH6944> place <WH6680>, as I commanded.

And Aaron <WH175> said <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, Behold <WH3117>, this day have they offered <WH7126> their sin offering <WH2403> and their burnt offering <WH5930> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>; and such things have happened <WH7122> me <WH398>: and if I had eaten the sin offering <WH2403> to day <WH3117>, should it have been accepted <WH3190> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068>?
And when Moses <WH4872> heard <WH8085> that <WH3190>, he was content.
